player.serverMessage: The LSE is a virtual world in which you can live the life you dream.
player.serverDescription: 'In this virtual world, you never truly die. Unless you delete yourself, but thats another story... Anyway. I'm your User Director, you can call me Alpha. Anytime you need help, want a little information about yourself, or just wanna say hi; come find me. You can view my Keybind in your settings menu once you have created your character. I hope to see you soon!'
